channel.title: Plugins on Open Live Writer Plugins
channel.description: Recent content in Plugins on Open Live Writer Plugins

item.title: Url2Title
item.description: Replaces pasted URLs with its corresponding title instead. You can keep the raw URL by pressing SHIFT key only if paste is done via contextual menu, but if pasted using hotkey Ctrl+V is done, it will paste URL’s title. It can be enabled/disabled in the plugins dialog window. Download: Url2Title.olwpkg Repository: Url2Title Original: Codeplex Archive License: Microsoft Public License (Ms-PL)
